mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve mobile navigation by optimizing images and ensuring content fits well on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce image sizes and use caching to improve page load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Enhance on-page SEO by adding more relevant keywords in page titles, headers, and meta descriptions.
userExperienceTip: Simplify the navigation menu and make the booking button more prominent for easier access.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing the number of steps and offering a more intuitive form layout.
tips: Simplify user experience and booking flow
